Source.Name: atool
Source.Summary: Manage file archives of various types
Source.Description: atool is a script for managing file archives of various types (tar, tar+gzip, zip etc). The main command is aunpack which extracts files from an archive

Package.Name: atool
Package.Summary: Manage file archives of various types
Package.Description: atool is a script for managing file archives of various types (tar, tar+gzip, zip etc). The main command is aunpack which extracts files from an archive
